msg: OPENJPA-1077 Validation-mode element support added to persistence.xml and to createEMF properties Map

author: seelmann

author: fancy
msg: OPENJPA-1064 JPA2 Query no support for embeddable of element collection in predicate and subquery
JPA2 spec (section 4.12) does not support comparisons over embeddable class.

author: gbrown
msg: Eliminate <wtkx:include> namespace attribute; now that includes can have IDs, the namespace attribute is redundant since the ID can be used for the same purpose.
